data.name: Black Widow
data.description: A stealthy saboteur who steals enemy advantages and delivers disabling attacks.

starItems.name: Black Widow
starItems.description: A stealthy saboteur who steals enemy advantages and delivers disabling attacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>35%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to copy all positive effects

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear copied positive effects

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear each copied positive effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear each copied positive effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
4.nextUpgrade: Always clear each copied positive effect

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self + clear each copied positive effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATATION</color> allies
Chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional allies

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional allies.
2.nextUpgrade: Chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all additional allies

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + clear all negative effects from self.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, and <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: Chain to up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to secondary targets

6.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Special - Camouflage Tech

7.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Special - Camouflage Tech.

This attack cannot be blocked and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed. This is applied after any character has taken an action.
1.nextUpgrade: On self or ally <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL MILITARY</color> allies

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

On <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed
On ally Hawkeye, Red Guardian, Yelena, or <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

On self or ally <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.

On ally Hawkeye, Red Guardian, Yelena, or <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>
On self or ally <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all Hawkeye, Red Guardian, or Yelena allies

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

On self or ally <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies + apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all Hawkeye, Yelena, and Red Guardian allies.

On ally Hawkeye, Red Guardian, Yelena, or <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Always gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on Spawn, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

On self or ally <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies + apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all Hawkeye, Yelena, and Red Guardian allies.

On ally Hawkeye, Red Guardian, Yelena, or <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> ally's turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on Spawn, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
